function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of detailed analysis on the attributes of green area visitors","Impact":"Inability to address specific visitor needs and behaviors during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive analysis of visitor demographics and behaviors in green areas","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, survey methods","People":"Residents, visitors to green areas","Owner":"Research institutions, local authorities"},{"Description":"Unexplored influence of socioeconomic attributes and environmental contexts on green space access","Impact":"Inequitable access to green areas for residents during and after the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct research to identify and understand the influence of socioeconomic attributes and environmental contexts on green space access","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, geographical information systems","People":"Citizens, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, local authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of data on the status of access and use of green areas during the COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Inability to develop evidence-based policies for safe and equal use of green areas during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct a questionnaire survey to gather data on access and use of green areas during the pandemic","Technologies":"Survey methods, data collection tools","People":"Residents, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, local authorities"}]}
